Mine too, if 'summon defence' would be more effective at keeping teammates 
close, that would be really nice.  Some indication of whether it wa on or not 
would be nifty too.

On Tuesday 13 May 2003 07:53, you wrote:
> My biggest frustration is the AI, obviously. My team
> members attack anything, regardless of level,
